title: LF Manager (Rewards available, money/gear/RP)
body:
Looking for someone that would be willing to dedicate their time to manage our new LoL team. Currently have a general manager that will help you out.

Role will be probationary for the first 2-3 months, after that I will reward you with money/gear/RP.

Looking for someone that will take the role seriously

Prefer someone of high rank (Ranking not an issue)

Age:

Rank:

Do you have many contacts within the LoL OCE Community? (Connected with top tier players/teams/other managers?)

Where do you live:

Why do you want the job:

What are your strengths and weaknesses?:

replies.body:
Very interested in this job.
Do I apply right here or talk to you through another method?
Add me in game if you want :)
*Position still not filled, interviews will take place next week*
Has this been filled? if not, I'd like to talk with you ingame.
Are you looking for a ranked manager?
Rank is not really an issue, it's just more favourable if you are high ranked.
